EmailTemplate.description: email to sub recip notifying rejection of payment request
EmailTemplate.name: payment request reject
EmailTemplate.subject: Payment Request rejected
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!PaymentRequest__c.OwnerFirstName} {!PaymentRequest__c.OwnerLastName},
This email is to notify you that, the Payment Request #{!PaymentRequest__c.Name} for the Grant #{!PaymentRequest__c.Grant__c} has been Rejected.
Payment Request Details:
Award: #{!PaymentRequest__c.Award__c}
Project Period: {!PaymentRequest__c.ProjectStartDate__c} - {!PaymentRequest__c.ProjectEndDate__c}
Kindly login to UGMS System and create new Payment Request.
Sincerely,
UtahGrants Support Team
